## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-772">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-772">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-773">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-774">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-774">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-775">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-776">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-776">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-777">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-778">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-778">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-779">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-779">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-780">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-780">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-781">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-781">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-782">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-782">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-783">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-784">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-784">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-787">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-787">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-788">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-788">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-789">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-790">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-790">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-791">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-791">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-792">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-793">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-793">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-794">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-795">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-795">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-796">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-796">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-797">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-797">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-798">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-798">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-799">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-799">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-800">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-800">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-801">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-801">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-802">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-803">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-803">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-804">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-804">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-805">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-805">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-806">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-806">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-808">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-808">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-811">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-811">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-812">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-812">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-827">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-827">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-829">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-830">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-831">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-831">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-832">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-833">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-833">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-834">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-834">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-835">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-835">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-836">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-836">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-837">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-838">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-838">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-839">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-839">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-840">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-840">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-841">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-841">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-843">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-843">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-846">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-846">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-847">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-847">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-848">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-848">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-849">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-849">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-851">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-851">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-852">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw = =</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-852">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-853">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-853">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-854">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-854">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-855">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-855">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-856">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-856">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-857">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-857">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-858">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-858">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-859">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-859">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-860">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-860">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-861">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-861">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-862">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-862">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-863">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-863">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-864">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-864">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-865">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-865">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-866">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-866">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-867">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-867">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-868">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-868">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-869">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-869">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-870">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-870">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-871">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-871">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-872">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-874">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-877">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-878">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-878">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-879">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-879">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-880">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-881">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-881">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-883">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-883">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-884">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-885">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-887">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-888">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-888">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-889">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-889">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-890">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-890">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-891">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-891">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-892">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-892">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-893">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-893">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-895">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-895">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-911">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-911">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-912">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-912">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-913">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-914">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-914">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-916">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-916">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-917">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-917">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-918">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-918">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-919">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-919">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-920">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-920">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-921">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-921">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-922">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-923">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-923">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-925">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-926">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-926">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-927">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-927">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-928">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-928">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-987">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-987">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-988">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-988">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-989">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-990">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-990">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-991">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-992">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-992">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-993">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-994">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-994">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-995">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-996">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-996">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-997">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-997">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-998">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-998">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-999">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-999">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1000">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1000">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1001">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1001">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1002">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1002">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1003">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1003">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1004">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1004">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1005">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1005">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1006">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1006">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1007">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1007">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1008">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1008">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1009">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1009">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1010">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1011">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1011">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1012">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1013">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1013">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1014">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1015">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1015">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1016">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1017">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1017">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1018">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1018">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1019">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1019">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1020">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1020">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1021">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1021">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1041">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1041">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1042">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1042">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1043">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1044">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1044">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1046">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1046">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1047">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1047">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1048">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1048">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1049">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1049">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1050">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1050">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1051">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1051">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1052">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1053">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1053">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1054">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1055">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1055">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1056">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1056">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1057">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1057">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1114">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1114">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1115">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1115">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1116">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1116">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1117">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1118">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1118">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1119">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1119">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1120">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1120">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1121">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1122">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1124">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1124">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1125">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1125">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1126">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1126">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1127">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1127">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1128">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1128">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1129">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1129">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1134">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1134">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1135">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1135">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1138">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1138">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1140">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1140">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1141">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1141">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1142">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1142">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1143">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1143">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1144">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1144">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1145">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1145">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1146">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1146">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1147">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1147">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1148">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1148">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1149">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1149">Inscrição</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1151">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1151">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1152">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1153">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1153">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1154">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1154">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1155">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1155">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1156">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1156">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1157">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1158">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1159">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1159">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1160">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1160">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1161">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1161">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1162">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1162">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1163">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1163">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1164">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1164">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1165">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1166">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1166">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1168">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1168">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1169">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1169">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1170">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1170">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1171">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1171">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1173">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1173">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1174">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1185">비즈니스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1185">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1186">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1186">Company</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1196">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1196">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1197">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1198">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1198">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1199">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1199">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1200">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1201">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1201">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1202">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1202">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1203">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1204">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1205">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1205">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1206">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1206">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1207">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1207">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1208">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1208">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1209">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1209">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1210">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1210">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1211">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1211">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1212">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1212">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1213">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1214">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1216">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1216">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1217">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1217">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1218">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1218">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1220">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1221">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1221">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1222">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1227">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1227">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1228">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1228">número de rregistro</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1233">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1233">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1234">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1236">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1236">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1238">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1238">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1239">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1239">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1240">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1240">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1241">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1241">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1242">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1242">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1243">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1243">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1244">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1244">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1263">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1263">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1266">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1268">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1268">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1269">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1269">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1270">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1270">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1271">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1271">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1272">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1272">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1273">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1273">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1274">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1274">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1275">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1275">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1276">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1276">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1277">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1277">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1278">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1278">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1280">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1280">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1325">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1325">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1326">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1328">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1328">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1329">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1330">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1330">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1331">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1332">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1333">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1334">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1335">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1335">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1336">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1336">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1337">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1337">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1338">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1338">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1339">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1339">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1340">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1340">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1341">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1341">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1342">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1342">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1343">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1343">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1344">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1344">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1345">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1346">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1346">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1348">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1348">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1349">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1350">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1350">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1352">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1353">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1353">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1354">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1354">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1355">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1356">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1356">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1401">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1401">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1402">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1403">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1403">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1405">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1405">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1406">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1406">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1407">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1407">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1408">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1408">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1409">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1409">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1410">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1410">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1411">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1411">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1415">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1416">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1417">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1417">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1418">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1419">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1420">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1420">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1421">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1421">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1445">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1445">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1447">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1447">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1449">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1449">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1454">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1454">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1455">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1455">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1456">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1456">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1592">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1592">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1593">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1594">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1594">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1595">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1595">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1596">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1596">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1597">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1598">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1601">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1601">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1602">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1602">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1603">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1603">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1605">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1605">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1606">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1606">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1607">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1607">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1608">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1608">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1609">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1609">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1610">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1610">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1611">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1611">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1612">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1612">workers compensation</span></span>
