## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1614">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1614">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1615">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1616">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1617">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1618">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1618">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1619">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1620">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1623">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1623">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1624">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1624">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1654">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1654">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1655">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1656">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1657">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1658">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1658">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1659">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1662">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1662">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1663">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1663">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1696">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1696">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1697">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1698">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1698">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1700">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1700">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1701">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1702">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1703">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1703">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1704">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1704">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1705">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1705">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1706">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1706">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1707">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1708">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1708">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1709">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1710">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1710">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1711">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1711">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1712">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1712">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1713">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1713">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1714">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1714">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1715">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1715">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1716">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1716">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1718">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1718">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1719">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1719">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1720">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1720">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1730">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1730">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1731">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1731">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1732">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1732">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1733">sin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1733">sin#</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1736">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1736">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1737">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1737">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1738">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1738">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1745">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1745">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1746">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1747">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1749">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1749">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1750">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1750">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1751">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1753">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1753">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1754">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1754">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1755">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1755">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1756">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1756">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1757">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1758">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1758">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1761">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1761">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1762">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1762">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1763">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1765">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1765">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1766">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1766">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1767">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1767">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1768">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1768">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1769">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1769">National Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1770">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1770">Identity card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1771">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1771">ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1772">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1772">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1773">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1773">Rol Único Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1774">실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1774">RUN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1775">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1775">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1776">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1776">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1777">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1777">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1778">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1778">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1779">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1779">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1780">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1780">Identificación</span></span> 
   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1781">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1781">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1782">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1783">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1783">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1785">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1785">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1786">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1786">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1787">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1787">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1788">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1788">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1789">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1789">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1790">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1791">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1791">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1793">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1794">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1794">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1795">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1795">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1797">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1797">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1798">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1798">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1799">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1800">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1800">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1801">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1801">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1802">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1802">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1803">중국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1803">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1804">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1804">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1805">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1805">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1806">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1806">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1807">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1807">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1808">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1808">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1809">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1809">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1810">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1810">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1811">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1811">鑑定</span></span> 
   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1812">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1812">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1814">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1814">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1816">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1816">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1817">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1818">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1818">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1820">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1821">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1821">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1822">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1822">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1823">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1823">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1824">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1824">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1825">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1825">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1826">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1826">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1827">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1828">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1828">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-1829">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-1829">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2035">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2035">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2036">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2036">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2037">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2038">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2038">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2040">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2040">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2041">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2041">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2042">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2042">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2043">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2043">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2044">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2045">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2045">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2046">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2046">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2047">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2047">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2048">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2048">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2049">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2049">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2050">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2050">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2051">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2051">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2052">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2052">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2053">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2053">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2054">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2054">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2055">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2055">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2056">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2056">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2057">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2057">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2058">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2058">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2059">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2059">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2060">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2060">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2061">vozačka dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2061">vozačka dozvola</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2062">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2062">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2063">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2063">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2064">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2065">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2065">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2067">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2067">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2068">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2069">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2072">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2072">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2073">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2073">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2074">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2074">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2075">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2075">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2076">majstorski broj građana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2076">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2077">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2077">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2078">nacidentifikacijski alni broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2078">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2079">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2079">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2104">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2104">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2105">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2105">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2106">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2107">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2107">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2108">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2108">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2109">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2109">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2110">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2110">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2111">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2111">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2112">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2112">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2113">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2113">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2114">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2114">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2115">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2115">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2116">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2116">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2117">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2117">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2118">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2118">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2119">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2119">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2120">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2120">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2121">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2121">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2122">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2122">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2124">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2124">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2126">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2126">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2127">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2127">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2128">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2128">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2129">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2130">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2130">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2131">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2133">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2133">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2134">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2134">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2135">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2135">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2137">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2137">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2138">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2138">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2139">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2139">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2140">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2140">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2141">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2141">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2142">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2142">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2143">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2143">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2144">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2144">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2145">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2145">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2146">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2147">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2147">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2148">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2149">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2149">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2150">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2150">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2151">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2151">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2152">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2153">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2153">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2155">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2156">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2156">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2157">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2157">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2159">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2159">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2160">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2160">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2167">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2167">ssn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2172">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2172">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2173">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2173">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2174">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2174">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2175">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2175">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2176">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2176">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2177">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2177">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2178">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2178">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2179">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2179">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2180">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2180">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2181">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2181">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2182">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2182">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2183">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2183">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2184">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2184">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2185">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2185">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2186">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2186">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2187">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2188">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2188">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2189">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2189">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2190">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2190">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2191">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2191">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2222">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2222">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2223">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2224">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2225">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2225">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2227">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2227">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2229">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2232">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2232">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2233">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2233">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2234">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2234">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2235">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2235">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2236">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2236">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2237">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2237">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2238">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2238">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2239">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2239">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2240">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2240">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2241">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2241">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2242">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2242">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2243">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2243">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2244">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2244">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2245">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2245">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2246">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2246">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2247">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2247">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2248">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2248">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2249">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2249">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2250">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2251">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2251">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2252">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2253">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2253">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2254">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2255">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2255">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2257">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2258">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2258">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2259">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2259">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2260">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2260">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2261">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2261">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2262">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2262">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2263">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2263">identity card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2266">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2266">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2267">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2267">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2268">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2268">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2269">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2269">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2270">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2271">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2271">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2273">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2273">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2275">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2278">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2278">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2279">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2279">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2280">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2280">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2281">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2281">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2282">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2282">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2283">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2283">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2284">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2284">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2285">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2285">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2286">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2286">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2287">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2287">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2289">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2289">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2291">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2291">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2292">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2292">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2293">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2293">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2294">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2294">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2295">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2296">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2296">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2298">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2298">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2299">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2299">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2300">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2300">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2302">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2302">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
