## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2331">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2331">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2332">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2332">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2333">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2334">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2334">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2336">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2336">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2337">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2337">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2338">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2338">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2339">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2339">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2340">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2341">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2341">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2343">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2344">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2344">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2345">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2345">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2346">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2346">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2347">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2347">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2348">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2348">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2349">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2349">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2350">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2350">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2351">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2351">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2352">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2352">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2353">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2353">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2354">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2354">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2355">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2355">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2356">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2356">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2357">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2358">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2358">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2359">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2359">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2360">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2360">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2361">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2361">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2362">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2362">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2363">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2363">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2364">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2365">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2367">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2367">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2368">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2369">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2369">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2371">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2372">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2372">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2373">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2373">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2374">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2374">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2375">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2375">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2376">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2376">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2377">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2377">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2378">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2378">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2379">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2379">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2380">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2380">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2381">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2381">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2382">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2382">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2384">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2384">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2386">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2386">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2387">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2387">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2388">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2388">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2389">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2389">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2390">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2390">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2391">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2391">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2392">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2392">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2393">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2393">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2394">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2394">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2395">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2395">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2396">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2396">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2397">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2397">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2398">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2399">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2399">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2401">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2402">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2402">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2403">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2403">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2404">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2405">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2405">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2406">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2406">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2407">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2407">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2408">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2408">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2409">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2410">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2410">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2412">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2412">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2413">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2413">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2414">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2414">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2415">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2415">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2416">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2416">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2421">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2421">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2422">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2422">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2424">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2424">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2425">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2425">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2426">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2426">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2427">돌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2427">birth number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2428">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2428">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2429">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2429">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2430">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2430">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2431">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2431">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2432">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2432">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2433">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2433">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2434">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2434">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2435">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2435">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2436">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2436">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2437">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2437">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2438">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2438">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2439">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2439">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2440">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2440">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2441">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2441">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2442">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2442">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2443">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2444">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2445">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2445">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2446">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2446">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2447">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2447">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2448">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2448">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2449">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2450">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2450">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2451">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2453">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2453">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2454">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2454">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2493">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2493">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2494">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2494">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2495">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2496">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2496">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2498">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2498">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2499">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2500">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2500">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2501">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2502">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2503">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2503">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2504">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2504">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2505">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2505">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2506">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2506">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2509">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2509">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2510">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2510">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2511">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2511">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2512">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2512">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2513">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2513">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2514">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2514">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2515">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2515">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2516">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2516">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2517">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2517">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2518">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2518">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2519">kørekort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2519">kørekort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2520">kørekortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2520">kørekortnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2521">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2521">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2522">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2522">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2523">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2524">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2524">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2525">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2526">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2526">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2527">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2528">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2528">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2529">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2531">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2531">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2532">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2532">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2533">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2533">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2534">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2534">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2535">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2535">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2536">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2536">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2537">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2537">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2538">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2538">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2539">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2539">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2540">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2540">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2541">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2541">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2542">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2543">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2543">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2545">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2545">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2546">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2546">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2547">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2547">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2548">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2548">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2552">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2553">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2553">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2554">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2606">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2606">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2607">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2607">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2608">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2609">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2610">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2611">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2611">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2612">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2612">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2613">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2613">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2614">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2614">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2615">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2616">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2616">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2619">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2619">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2620">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2620">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2622">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2622">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2623">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2623">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2624">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2624">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2625">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2625">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2626">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2626">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2627">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2627">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2628">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2628">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2629">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2629">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2630">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2630">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2631">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2631">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2632">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2632">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2633">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2633">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2634">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2634">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2635">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2635">personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2636">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2636">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2637">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2637">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2638">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2638">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2639">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2640">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2640">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2641">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2641">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2642">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2642">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2643">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2643">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2644">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2644">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2646">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2649">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2649">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2650">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2650">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2652">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2652">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2704">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2704">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2705">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2706">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2706">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2708">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2708">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2709">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2709">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2710">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2710">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2711">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2711">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2712">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2713">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2713">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2714">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2715">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2716">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2716">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2718">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2718">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2719">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2719">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2720">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2720">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2721">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2721">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2722">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2723">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2723">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2725">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2725">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2726">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2726">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2727">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2727">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2728">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2728">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2729">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2729">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2730">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2730">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2731">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2732">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2732">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2733">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2733">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2734">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2734">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2735">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2735">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2736">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2736">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2737">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2737">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2738">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2738">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2739">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2739">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2740">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2740">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2741">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2741">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2742">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2742">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2743">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2743">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2744">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2744">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2745">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2745">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2746">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2746">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2747">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2747">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2748">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2748">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2749">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2749">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2750">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2752">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2752">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2754">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2754">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2755">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2755">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2756">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2756">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2757">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2757">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2758">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2758">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2759">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2760">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2760">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2763">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2763">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2764">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2764">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2766">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2766">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2799">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2799">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2800">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2800">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2802">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2802">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2804">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2804">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2805">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2806">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2808">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2808">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2809">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2809">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2810">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2810">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2811">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2811">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2812">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2812">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2813">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2813">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2814">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2814">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2815">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2815">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2816">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2816">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2817">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2817">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2818">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2818">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2820">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2820">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2822">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2822">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2823">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2823">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2824">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2824">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2825">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2825">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2826">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2826">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2827">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2828">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2829">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2830">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2830">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2831">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2831">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2832">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2832">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2833">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2833">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2834">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2834">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2867">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2867">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2868">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2869">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2869">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2871">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2871">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2873">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2876">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2876">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2877">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2877">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2878">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2878">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2879">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2880">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2880">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2881">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2881">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2882">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2882">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-2883">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-2883">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3329">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3329">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3332">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3334">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3334">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3335">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3335">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3336">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3336">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3337">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3337">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3342">정규식이 해당 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3342">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3343">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3343">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3345">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3345">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3346">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3346">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3347">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3347">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3348">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3349">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3350">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3355">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3355">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3356">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3356">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3357">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3357">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3358">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3358">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3359">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3359">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3360">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3360">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3362">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3362">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3364">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3364">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3365">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3365">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3366">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3366">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3367">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3367">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3368">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3368">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3370">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3370">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3372">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3373">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3373">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3374">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3374">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3375">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3375">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
