## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3424">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3424">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3425">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3425">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3426">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3426">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3427">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3428">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3429">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3429">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3430">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3430">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3431">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3431">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3432">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3432">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3433">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3434">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3434">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3435">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3436">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3436">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3437">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3437">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3438">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3438">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3439">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3439">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3440">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3440">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3441">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3441">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3442">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3442">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3443">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3444">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3445">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3445">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3446">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3446">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3447">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3447">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3448">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3448">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3449">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3449">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3450">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3450">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3451">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3451">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3452">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3452">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3453">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3453">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3454">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3454">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3455">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3455">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3456">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3456">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3457">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3457">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3458">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3458">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3459">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3459">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3460">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3460">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3466">핀란드어 국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3466">finnish national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3476">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3476">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3484">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3484">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3485">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3487">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3489">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3489">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3490">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3490">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3491">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3491">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3492">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3492">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3493">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3493">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3495">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3495">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3498">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3498">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3499">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3499">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3501">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3501">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3502">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3502">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3503">Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3503">Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3504">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3504">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3505">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3505">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3506">henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3506">henkilötunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3507">henkilötunnusnumero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3507">henkilötunnusnumero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3508">henkilötunnusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3508">henkilötunnusnumero</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3552">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3552">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3553">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3553">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3554">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3555">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3555">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3557">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3557">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3558">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3559">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3559">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3562">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3562">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3563">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3563">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3564">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3564">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3565">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3565">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3566">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3566">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3567">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3567">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3568">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3568">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3569">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3569">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3570">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3570">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3571">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3571">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3572">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3572">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3577">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3577">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3578">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3578">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3579">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3580">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3581">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3582">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3583">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3584">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3584">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3585">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3586">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3587">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3587">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3589">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3589">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3590">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3590">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3591">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3591">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3600">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3600">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3601">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3601">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3603">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3603">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3605">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3605">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3606">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3606">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3607">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3607">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3608">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3608">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3609">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3610">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3610">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3612">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3612">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3613">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3613">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3614">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3614">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3620">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3620">Passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3626">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3626">パスポートのNum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3628">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3628">Numéro de passeport</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3635">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3635">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3636">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3636">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3637">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3638">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3638">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3639">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3640">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3640">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3641">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3641">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3642">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3642">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3643">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3643">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3644">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3645">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3645">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3647">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3648">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3648">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3649">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3649">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3650">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3652">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3652">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3653">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3653">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3654">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3654">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3656">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3656">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3680">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3680">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3681">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3681">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3682">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3683">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3683">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3685">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3685">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3686">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3686">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3687">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3687">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3688">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3688">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3690">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3690">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3693">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3693">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3694">From 키워드를 `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3694">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3696">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3696">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3697">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3697">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3698">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3698">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3699">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3699">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3700">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3700">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3701">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3701">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3702">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3702">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3703">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3703">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3704">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3704">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3705">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3705">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3707">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3707">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3716">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3716">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3717">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3717">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3718">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3719">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3719">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3721">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3721">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3722">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3722">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3723">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3723">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3724">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3724">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3725">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3725">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3726">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3726">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3727">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3728">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3728">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3731">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3731">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3732">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3732">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3733">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3734">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3734">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3735">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3735">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3736">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3821">N-Fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3821">N-Fuhrerschein</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3822">N-Fuehrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3822">N-Fuehrerschein</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3829">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3829">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3830">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3830">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3831">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3831">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3832">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3833">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3833">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3834">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3834">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3835">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3835">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3836">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3836">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3837">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3837">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3838">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3838">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3839">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3839">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3840">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3840">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3841">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3842">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3842">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3843">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3844">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3845">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3845">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3846">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3847">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3847">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3848">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3848">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3849">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3849">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3850">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3850">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3851">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3851">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3852">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3852">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3853">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3853">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3854">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3854">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3855">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3855">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3856">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3856">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3857">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3857">personal id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3860">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3860">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3862">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3862">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3863">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3863">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3864">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3865">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3865">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3867">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3867">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3868">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3868">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3869">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3869">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3870">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3870">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3871">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3871">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3873">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3876">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3876">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3877">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3877">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3878">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3880">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3880">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3881">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3881">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3882">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3882">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3900">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3900">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3901">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3901">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3903">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3903">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3905">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3905">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3906">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3906">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3907">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3907">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3908">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3908">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3909">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3909">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3910">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3910">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3911">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3911">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3912">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3912">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3913">From 키워드를 `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3913">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3914">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3915">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3915">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3941">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3941">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3942">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3942">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3943">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3944">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3944">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3945">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3945">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3946">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3946">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3947">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3948">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3949">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3950">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3951">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3951">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3952">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3952">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3954">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3954">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3958">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3958">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3959">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3959">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3960">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3960">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3961">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3961">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3962">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3962">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3963">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3963">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3964">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3964">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3965">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3965">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3968">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3968">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3969">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3969">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3970">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3970">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3971">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3972">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3972">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3974">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3974">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3975">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3975">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3976">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3976">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3977">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3977">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3978">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3978">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3979">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3979">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3980">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3980">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3981">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3981">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3982">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3983">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3985">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3986">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3986">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3987">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3988">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3989">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3989">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3990">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3990">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3991">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3991">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3992">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3992">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3993">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3993">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3994">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3994">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3995">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3995">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3996">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3996">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3997">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3997">ταυτότητας</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3998">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3998">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-3999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-3999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4001">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4003">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4003">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4005">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4008">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4008">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4009">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4009">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4010">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4010">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4011">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4011">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4012">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4012">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4013">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4013">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4014">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4014">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4015">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4015">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4016">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4016">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4017">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4017">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4018">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4019">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4019">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4021">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4021">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4022">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4023">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4023">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4024">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4025">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4025">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4026">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4026">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4027">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4027">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4056">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4056">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4057">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4058">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4060">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4060">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4061">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4061">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4062">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4062">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4063">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4063">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4064">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4065">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4065">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4066">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4067">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4067">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4068">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4068">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4069">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4069">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4070">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4070">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4072">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4072">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4073">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4073">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4090">香港身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4090">香港身分証</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4102">香港非永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4102">香港非永久性居民身分證</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4105">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4105">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span></span>
