- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4111">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4111">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>
   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4112">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4112">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4113">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4113">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4115">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4115">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4117">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4117">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4118">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4118">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4119">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4119">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4120">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4120">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4121">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4121">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4122">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4122">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4123">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4123">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4124">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4124">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4125">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4125">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4126">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4126">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4127">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4127">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4128">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4128">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4129">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4129">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4130">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4130">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4131">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4131">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4132">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4132">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4133">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4133">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4134">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4134">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4135">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4135">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4136">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4136">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4137">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4137">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4138">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4138">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4139">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4139">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4140">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4140">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4141">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4141">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4142">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4142">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4143">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4144">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4144">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4145">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4146">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4146">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4147">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4147">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4148">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4148">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4149">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4149">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4150">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4150">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4155">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4155">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4156">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4156">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4157">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4158">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4158">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4159">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4159">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4160">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4160">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4161">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4161">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4162">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4162">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4163">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4163">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4164">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4164">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4165">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4165"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4166">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4166">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4167">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4167">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4168">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4168">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4169">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4169">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4170">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4170">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4171">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4172">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4172">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4174">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4174">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4175">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4175">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4176">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4176">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4177">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4178">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4178">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4179">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4179">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4180">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4180">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4181">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4181">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4182">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4182">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4183">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4183">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4184">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4184">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4185">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4185">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4186">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4186">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4187">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4187">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4188">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4188">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4189">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4190">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4190">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4191">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4192">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4192">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4193">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4194">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4194">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4195">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4196">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4196">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4197">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4197">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4198">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4198">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4200">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4200">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4213">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4213">social security no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4217">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4217">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4220">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4220">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4221">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4221">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4222">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4223">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4223">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4225">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4225">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4226">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4226">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4227">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4227">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4228">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4228">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4229">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4229">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4230">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4230">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4231">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4231">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4232">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4232">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4233">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4233">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4234">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4234">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4235">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4235">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4236">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4237">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4237">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4238">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4238">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4239">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4239">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4241">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4241">adóhatóság szám</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4246">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4247">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4247">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4248">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4248">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4249">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4249">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4250">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4250">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4251">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4251">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4252">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4252">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4253">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4253">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4254">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4254">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4255">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4255">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4256">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4256">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4257">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4257">taxnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4263">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4263">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4264">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4265">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4265">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4267">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4267">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4268">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4268">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4269">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4269">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4270">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4270">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4272">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4272">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4275">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4275">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4276">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4276">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4277">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4277">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4278">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4278">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4279">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4279">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4282">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4282">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4283">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4284">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4284">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4286">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4286">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4287">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4287">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4288">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4288">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4289">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4289">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4290">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4290">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4291">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4291">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4292">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4293">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4293">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4294">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4295">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4295">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4296">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4296">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4297">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4297">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4298">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4298">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4299">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4299">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4300">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4300">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4301">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4301">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4302">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4302">Aadhar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4304">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4304">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4305">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4305">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4306">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4306">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4307">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4308">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4308">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4309">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4310">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4310">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4311">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4311">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4312">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4312">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4313">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4313">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4314">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4314">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4315">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4315">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4316">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4316">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4317">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4317">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4318">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4318">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4319">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4319">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4320">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4320">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4321">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4321">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4322">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4322">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4323">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4323">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4324">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4324">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4325">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4325">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4326">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4326">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4327">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4327">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4328">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4328">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4329">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4329">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4330">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4330">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4331">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4331">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4332">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4332">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4333">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4334">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4334">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4336">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4336">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4337">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4337">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4338">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4338">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4339">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4339">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4340">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4340">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4341">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4341">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4342">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4342">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4343">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4343">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4344">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4345">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4345">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4346">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4347">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4347">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4348">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4348">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4349">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4349">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4350">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4350">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4351">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4351">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4352">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4352">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4354">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4354">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4356">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4356">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4357">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4358">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4360">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4360">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4361">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4362">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4362">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4363">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4363">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4364">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4364">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4365">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4365">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4368">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4368">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4369">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4369">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4370">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4370">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4371">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4371">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4372">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4372">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4373">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4373">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4374">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4374">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4375">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4376">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4376">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4378">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4379">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4379">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4380">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4380">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4382">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4382">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4383">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4383">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4384">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4384">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4385">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4385">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4386">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4386">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4387">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4387">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4388">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4388">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4389">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4389">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4390">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4390">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4391">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4391">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4392">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4392">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4393">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4393">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4394">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4395">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4396">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4397">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4398">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4398">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4399">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4399">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4400">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4400">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4401">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4401">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4402">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4402">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4403">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4403">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4404">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4404">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4405">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4405">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4406">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4406">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4407">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4408">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4408">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4409">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4409">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4410">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4410">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4411">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4411">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4412">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4412">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4413">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4413">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4414">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4414">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4415">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4415">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4416">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4417">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4417">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4418">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4419">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4419">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4420">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4420">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4421">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4421">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4422">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4423">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4425">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4425">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4426">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4426">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4427">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4427">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4428">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4428">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4429">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4429">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4432">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4432">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4433">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4433">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4434">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4434">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4435">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4435">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4436">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4436">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4437">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4437">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4438">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4438">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4439">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4439">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4440">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4440">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4441">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4441">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4442">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4442">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4443">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4443">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4444">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4444">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4445">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4446">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4446">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4447">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4448">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4448">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4449">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4449">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4450">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4450">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4451">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4451">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4452">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4452">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4453">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4453">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4454">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4454">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4455">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4455">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4456">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4456">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4457">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4458">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4458">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4461">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4461">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4462">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4462">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4464">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4464">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4493">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4493">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4494">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4494">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4495">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4496">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4496">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4498">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4498">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4499">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4499">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4500">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4500">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4501">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4502">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4502">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4503">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4505">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4505">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4506">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4506">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4507">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4507">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4508">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4508">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4509">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4509">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4510">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4510">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4511">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4511">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4512">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4512">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4513">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4513">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4514">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4514">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4515">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4515">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4516">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4516">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4517">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4518">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4518">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4519">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4519">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4520">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4520">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4521">7자리 숫자와 2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4521">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4522">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4523">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4523">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4524">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4524">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4525">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4525">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4526">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4526">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4527">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4527">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4528">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4528">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4529">문자 "A" 또는 "H"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4529">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4530">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4530">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4531">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4531">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4532">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4532">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4533">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4533">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4534">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4534">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4535">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4535">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4536">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4536">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4537">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4537">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4538">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4539">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4540">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4540">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4541">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4546">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4546">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4547">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4547">PPS No.</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4556">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4556">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4557">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4557">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4559">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4559">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4561">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4561">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4562">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4562">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4563">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4563">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4564">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4565">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4565">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4566">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4567">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4567">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4568">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4568">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4569">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4569">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4570">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4571">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4571">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
