## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4600">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4600">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4601">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4602">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4602">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4604">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4604">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4605">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4605">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4606">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4606">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4607">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4607">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4608">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4608">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4609">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4609">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4610">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4610">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4611">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4611">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4612">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4613">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4613">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4614">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4615">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4615">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4616">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4616">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4617">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4617">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4618">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4618">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4619">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4619">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4620">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4620">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4621">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4621">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4622">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4622">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4623">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4623">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4624">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4624">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4626">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4626">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4628">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4628">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4629">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4630">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4630">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4631">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4632">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4632">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4633">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4633">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4634">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4634">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4635">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4635">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4636">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4636">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4637">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4637">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4638">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4638">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4639">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4639">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4640">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4640">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4641">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4641">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4642">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4643">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4643">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4644">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4644">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4645">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4645">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4646">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4646">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4647">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4647">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4648">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4648">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4649">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4649">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4651">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4651">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4653">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4654">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4654">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4655">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4655">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4656">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4656">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4657">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4657">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4658">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4658">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4659">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4659">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4660">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4660">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4661">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4661">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4662">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4663">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4663">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4665">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4665">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4666">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4666">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4667">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4667">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4668">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4668">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4669">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4669">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4670">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4670">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4671">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4671">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4672">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4672">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4673">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4674">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4674">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4677">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4677">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4678">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4678">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4679">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4679">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4680">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4680">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4698">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4715">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4715">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4716">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4716">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4717">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4717">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4718">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4718">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4719">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4719">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4720">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4720">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4721">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4721">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4722">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4722">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4724">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4724">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4727">정규식이 해당 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4727">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4728">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4728">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4729">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4729">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4730">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4730">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4731">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4731">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4732">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4732">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4733">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4733">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4734">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4734">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4735">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4735">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4736">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4736">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4737">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4737">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4738">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4738">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4739">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4739">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4740">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4740">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4741">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4741">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4742">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4743">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4743">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4744">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4745">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4745">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4746">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4746">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4747">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4747">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4748">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4748">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4749">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4749">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4750">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4750">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4751">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4751">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4752">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4752">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4754">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4754">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4757">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4757">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4758">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4758">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4760">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4760">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4795">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4795">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4796">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4797">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4797">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4799">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4799">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4800">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4800">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4801">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4801">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4802">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4802">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4803">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4803">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4804">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4804">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4805">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4808">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4808">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4809">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4809">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4810">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4810">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4811">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4811">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4812">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4812">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4813">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4813">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4814">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4814">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4815">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4815">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4816">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4816">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4874">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4874">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4875">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4875">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4876">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4877">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4877">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4879">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4879">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4880">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4881">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4883">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4884">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4884">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4885">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4885">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4913">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4913">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4914">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4915">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4915">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4917">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4917">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4918">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4918">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4919">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4919">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4920">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4920">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4921">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4921">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4922">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4922">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4923">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4923">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4924">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4924">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4925">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4925">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4926">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4926">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4927">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4927">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4928">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4928">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4929">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4929">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4930">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4930">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4931">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4932">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4932">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4933">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4933">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4934">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4934">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4935">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4935">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4936">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4936">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4937">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4937">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4938">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4939">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4941">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4941">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4942">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4942">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4943">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4943">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4944">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4944">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4945">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4945">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4946">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4946">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4947">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4947">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4948">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4948">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4949">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4949">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4950">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4950">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4951">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4952">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4952">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4953">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4954">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4954">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4955">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4956">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4957">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4958">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4958">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4959">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4959">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4960">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4960">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4961">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4961">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4962">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4962">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4963">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4963">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4964">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4964">Resident Register Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4966">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4966">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4967">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4967">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4968">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4968">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4969">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4969">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4971">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4971">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4972">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4972">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4973">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4973">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4974">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4974">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4975">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4976">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4976">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4978">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4978">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4979">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4979">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4980">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4980">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4981">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4981">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4982">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4982">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4983">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4986">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4987">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4987">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4988">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4988">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4990">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4990">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4991">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4991">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4992">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4992">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4993">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4993">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4994">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4994">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4995">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4995">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4996">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4996">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4997">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4997">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4998">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4998">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-4999">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-4999">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5000">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5002">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5002">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5004">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5004">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5005">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5005">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5006">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5006">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5007">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5008">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5008">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5009">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5011">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5011">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5012">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5012">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5028">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5028">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5029">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5029">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5030">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5031">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5031">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5032">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5032">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5033">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5034">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5034">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5035">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5035">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5036">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5036">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5037">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5037">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5038">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5039">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5039">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5040">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5041">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5041">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5042">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5042">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5043">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5043">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5044">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5045">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5045">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5108">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5108">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5109">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5109">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5110">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5111">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5111">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5112">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5113">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5113">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5114">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5114">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5115">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5115">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5116">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5116">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5117">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5117">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5118">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5118">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5119">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5119">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5120">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5120">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5121">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5121">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5122">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5122">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5123">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5123">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5124">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5124">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5125">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5125">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5126">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5126">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5127">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5127">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5128">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5128">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5129">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5130">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5131">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5131">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5132">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5133">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5133">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5134">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5134">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5135">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5135">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5136">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5136">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5137">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5138">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5138">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5140">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5140">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5141">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5141">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5142">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5142">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5143">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5143">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5144">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5144">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5207">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5207">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5208">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5209">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5210">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5210">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5211">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5212">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5212">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5213">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5214">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5214">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5216">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5216">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5217">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5217">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5218">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5218">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5220">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5220">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5224">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5224">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5225">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5225">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5227">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5227">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5228">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5228">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5230">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5230">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5231">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5231">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5234">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5234">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5235">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5237">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5237">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5239">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5239">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5240">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5240">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5241">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5241">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5242">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5242">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5243">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5243">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5244">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5245">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5245">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5246">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5247">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5248">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5248">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5249">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5249">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5251">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5251">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5286">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5286">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5287">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5287">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5289">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5289">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5291">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5291">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5292">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5293">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5293">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5294">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5296">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5296">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5297">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5297">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5298">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5298">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5299">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5299">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5300">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5300">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5301">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5301">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5302">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5302">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5303">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5303">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5304">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5304">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5305">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5305">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5306">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5306">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5307">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5308">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5308">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5309">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5310">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5311">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5311">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5312">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5312">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5314">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5314">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
