## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5348">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5348">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5349">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5349">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5350">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5351">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5351">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5352">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5352">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5353">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5353">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5354">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5354">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5355">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5355">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5356">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5356">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5358">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5358">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5359">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5359">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5360">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5360">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5361">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5361">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5362">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5362">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5364">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5364">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5365">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5365">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5366">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5366">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5367">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5367">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5368">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5368">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5369">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5369">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5370">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5370">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5371">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5371">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5372">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5372">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5373">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5373">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5374">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5374">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5375">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5375">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5376">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5376">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5377">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5378">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5378">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5380">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5380">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5381">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5381">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5382">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5382">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5383">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5383">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5384">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5384">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5385">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5386">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5386">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5387">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5388">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5388">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5389">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5389">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5390">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5390">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5391">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5391">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5392">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5392">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5393">eindeutige id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5393">eindeutige id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5394">eindeutige id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5394">eindeutige id-nummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5413">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5413">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5414">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5415">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5416">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5416">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5418">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5418">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5419">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5420">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5420">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5422">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5422">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5423">정규식이 해당 `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5423">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5424">From 키워드를 `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5425">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5425">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5426">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5426">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5427">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5427">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5428">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5428">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5429">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5429">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5430">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5431">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5431">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5432">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5432">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5433">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5433">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5434">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5434">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5435">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5435">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5436">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5437">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5437">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5438">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5439">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5440">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5440">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5441">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5441">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5442">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5442">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5443">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5443">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5483">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5483">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5485">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5485">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5487">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5487">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5488">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5488">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5489">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5489">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5490">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5490">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5491">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5491">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5492">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5492">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5493">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5493">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5495">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5495">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5498">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5498">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5499">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5499">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5526">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5526">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5527">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5527">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5528">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5529">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5529">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5530">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5531">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5531">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5532">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5532">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5533">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5533">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5534">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5534">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5535">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5535">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5536">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5536">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5538">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5538">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5541">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5541">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5542">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5542">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5544">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5544">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5545">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5545">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5547">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5547">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5548">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5548">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5549">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5549">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5550">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5550">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5551">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5551">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5552">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5552">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5553">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5553">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5554">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5554">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5555">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5555">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5556">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5556">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5557">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5557">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5558">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5558">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5559">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5560">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5561">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5561">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5563">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5563">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5564">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5564">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5565">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5565">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5567">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5567">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5570">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5570">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5571">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5572">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5573">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5573">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5590">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5590">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5591">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5591">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5593">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5593">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5594">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5594">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5595">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5595">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5596">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5597">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5598">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5599">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5600">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5600">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5601">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5601">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5602">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5602">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5603">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5603">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5604">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5604">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5605">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5605">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5606">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5606">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5607">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5607">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5608">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5608">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5609">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5609">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5610">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5611">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5611">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5612">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5612">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5614">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5614">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5615">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5615">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5616">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5616">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5617">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5617">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5618">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5618">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5619">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5620">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5620">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5623">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5623">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5624">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5624">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5625">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5625">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5626">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5626">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5659">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5659">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5661">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5661">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5663">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5663">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5664">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5664">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5665">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5665">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5666">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5666">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5667">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5667">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5668">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5668">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5669">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5670">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5670">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5672">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5673">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5673">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5674">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5674">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5675">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5675">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5677">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5677">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_bsn"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5678">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5678">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5679">bsn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5679">bsn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5680">bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5680">bsn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5681">burgerservicenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5681">burgerservicenummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5682">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5682">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5683">사용자 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5683">person number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5684">개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5684">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5685">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5685">personal numeric code</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5700">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5700">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5701">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5701">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5702">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5702">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5703">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5704">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5704">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5705">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5705">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5706">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5706">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5707">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5707">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5708">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5708">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5709">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5710">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5710">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5711">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5711">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5712">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5712">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5713">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5713">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5716">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5716">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5717">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5717">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5718">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5718">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5719">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5719">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5720">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5720">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5721">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5721">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5722">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5722">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5723">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5723">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5724">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5724">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5725">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5725">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5726">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5726">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5729">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5729">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5730">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5730">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5731">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5732">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5732">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5734">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5734">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5735">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5736">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5736">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5739">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5739">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5740">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5740">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5741">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5742">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5742">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5766">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5766">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5767">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5767">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5768">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5769">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5769">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5770">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5771">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5771">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5772">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5773">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5773">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5774">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5775">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5776">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5776">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5777">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5777">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5778">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5778">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5779">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5779">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5780">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5780">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5781">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5781">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5783">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5783">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5784">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5784">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5785">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5785">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5787">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5787">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5788">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5788">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5789">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5790">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5790">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5791">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5792">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5792">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5793">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5794">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5794">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5795">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5796">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5796">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5797">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5797">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5798">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5798">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5799">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5799">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5800">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5800">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5838">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5838">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5839">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5840">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5840">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5841">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5842">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5842">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5843">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5844">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5844">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5845">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5846">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5847">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5847">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5848">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5848">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5849">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5849">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5850">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5850">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5851">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5851">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5852">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5852">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5853">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5853">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5854">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5854">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5855">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5855">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5856">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5856">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5857">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5857">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5858">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5858">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5859">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5859">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5860">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5860">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5861">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5861">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5862">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5862">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5863">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5863">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5864">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5865">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5865">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5868">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5868">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5869">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5869">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5870">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5870">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5871">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5872">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5872">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5873">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5873">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5875">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5875">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5876">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5876">Personal identification number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5882">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5882">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5883">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5883">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5884">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5884">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5885">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5885">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5886">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5886">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5887">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5888">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5888">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5889">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5889">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5890">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5890">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5891">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5891">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5892">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5892">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5893">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5893">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5894">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5894">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5895">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5895">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5896">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5896">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5897">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5897">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5898">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5898">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5899">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5899">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5900">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5900">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5901">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5901">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5902">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5902">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5903">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5903">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5904">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5904">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5905">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5907">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5907">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5909">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5909">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5910">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5910">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5911">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5911">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5912">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5912">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5913">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5913">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5914">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5914">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5915">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5916">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5916">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5918">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5919">정규식이 해당 `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5919">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5920">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5920">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5922">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5922">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5925">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5925">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5926">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5926">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5927">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5927">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5928">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5928">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5929">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5929">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5930">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5930">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5931">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5931">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5932">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5932">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5933">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5933">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5934">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5934">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5935">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5935">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5936">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5936">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5937">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5938">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5938">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5939">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5940">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5940">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5941">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5941">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5942">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5942">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5943">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5943">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5944">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5944">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5945">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5945">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5946">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5946">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5947">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5947">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5948">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5948">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5949">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5949">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5950">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5950">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5951">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5951">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5952">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5953">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5953">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5954">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5954">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5955">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5955">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5956">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5956">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5957">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5957">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5958">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5959">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5960">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5960">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5961">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5962">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5962">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5963">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5964">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5964">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5965">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5966">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5966">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5967">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5967">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5968">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5968">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5969">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5969">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5970">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5970">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5971">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5971">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5972">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5972">dowód osobisty</span></span>
