## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5981">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5981">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5982">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5982">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5983">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5984">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5984">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5986">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5986">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5987">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5988">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5990">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5990">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5991">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5991">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5992">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5992">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5993">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5993">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5994">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5994">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5995">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5995">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5996">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5996">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5997">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5997">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5998">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5998">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-5999">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-5999">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6000">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6000">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6001">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6001">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6002">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6002">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6003">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6003">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6004">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6004">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6005">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6005">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6007">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6010">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6010">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6011">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6011">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6012">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6013">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6013">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6043">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6043">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6044">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6044">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6045">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6045">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6046">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6047">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6047">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6049">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6049">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6050">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6051">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6052">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6053">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6054">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6054">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6055">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6055">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6056">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6057">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6057">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6058">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6058">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6059">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6059">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6060">시민 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6060">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6061">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6061">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6062">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6062">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6063">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6063">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6064">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6064">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6065">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6065">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6066">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6066">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6067">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6067">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6068">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6068">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6069">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6069">nic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6070">número bi de 포르투갈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6070">número bi de portugal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6071">número de identificação 민사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6071">número de identificação civil</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6072">número de identificação 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6072">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6073">número do documento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6073">número do documento</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6074">포르투갈 bi 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6074">portugal bi number</span></span>


## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6075">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6075">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6076">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6076">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6078">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6078">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6080">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6080">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6081">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6081">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6082">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6082">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6083">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6083">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6084">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6084">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6085">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6085">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6086">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6086">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6087">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6087">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6088">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6088">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6089">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6089">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6090">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6090">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6091">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6091">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6092">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6092">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6093">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6093">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6094">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6094">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6096">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6096">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6097">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6097">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6098">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6098">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6099">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6099">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6100">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6100">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6101">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6101">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6102">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6102">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6103">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6103">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6104">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6104">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6105">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6105">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6106">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6106">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6107">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6107">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6108">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6108">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6109">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6110">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6110">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6112">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6112">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6113">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6113">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6114">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6114">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6115">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6119">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6119">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6120">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6120">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6121">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6121">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6122">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6122">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6123">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6123">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6124">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6124">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6125">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6125">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6126">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6126">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6127">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6127">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6128">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6128">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6129">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6129">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6131">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6134">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6134">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6135">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6135">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6137">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6137">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6160">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6160">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6161">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6161">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6162">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6162">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6163">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6163">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6164">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6165">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6165">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6166">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6167">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6167">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6168">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6168">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6169">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6169">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6170">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6171">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6172">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6174">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6174">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6175">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6175">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6176">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6176">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6177">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6177">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6178">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6178">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6179">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6179">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6180">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6180">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6181">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6181">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6182">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6182">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6183">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6183">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6184">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6184">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6185">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6185">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6186">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6186">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6187">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6187">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6188">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6188">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6189">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6189">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6190">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6190">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6191">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6191">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6192">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6192">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6193">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6194">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6194">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6195">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6196">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6196">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6197">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6198">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6198">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6199">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6201">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6201">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6202">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6202">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6204">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6204">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6255">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6255">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6256">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6258">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6258">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6260">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6260">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6262">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6265">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6265">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6266">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6266">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6267">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6267">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6268">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6268">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6269">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6269">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6270">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6270">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6271">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6271">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6272">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6272">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6273">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6273">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6274">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6275">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6276">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6276">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6278">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6278">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6279">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6280">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6280">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6282">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6282">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6283">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6283">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6284">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6284">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6335">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6335">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6336">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6336">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6337">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6337">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6338">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6338">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6339">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6339">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6340">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6341">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6343">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6344">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6344">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6345">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6345">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6346">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6346">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6347">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6347">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6348">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6348">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6349">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6349">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6350">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6350">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6351">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6351">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6352">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6352">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6354">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6354">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6355">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6356">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6356">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6357">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6357">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6358">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6358">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6359">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6359">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6360">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6361">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6361">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6362">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6363">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6363">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6364">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6364">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6365">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6365">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6366">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6366">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6367">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6367">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6368">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6368">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6369">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6369">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6380">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6380">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6381">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6381">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6382">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6383">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6383">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6384">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6385">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6385">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6386">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6386">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6387">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6387">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6388">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6389">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6389">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6390">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6391">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6391">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6392">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6392">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6393">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6393">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6394">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6394">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6395">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6395">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6396">dl # driver license driver 면허 번호 드라이버 라이선스 드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6396">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6397">drivers license driver 면허 드라이버의 라이선스 드라이버 라이선스 번호 운전 면허 번호 라이센스 번호 제어 # vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6397">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6398">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6398">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6399">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6399">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6401">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6401">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6403">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6403">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6404">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6404">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6405">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6405">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6406">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6406">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6407">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6407">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6408">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6408">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6409">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6409">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6410">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6411">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6411">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6458">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6458">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6459">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6459">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6460">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6460">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6461">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6461">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6462">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6462">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6463">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6463">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6464">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6465">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6465">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6466">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6467">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6467">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6468">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6468">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6469">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6469">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6470">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6470">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6471">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6471">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6472">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6472">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6473">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6473">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6474">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6474">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6475">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6475">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6476">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6476">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6477">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6477">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6478">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6479">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6479">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6480">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6481">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6481">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6482">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6483">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6483">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6484">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6485">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6485">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6486">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6486">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6487">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6487">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6534">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6534">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6535">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6535">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6536">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6537">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6537">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6539">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6539">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6540">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6541">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6544">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6544">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6545">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6545">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6546">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6546">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6547">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6547">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6548">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6548">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6549">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6549">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6550">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6550">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6551">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6551">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6552">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6552">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6553">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6553">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6554">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6554">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6555">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6555">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6556">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6556">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6557">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6557">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6558">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6558">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6559">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6559">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6560">vozniško dovoljenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6560">vozniško dovoljenje</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6561">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6561">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6562">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6563">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6564">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6564">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6565">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6566">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6566">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6567">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6567">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6568">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6568">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6569">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6569">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6570">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6570">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6571">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6572">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6572">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6573">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6574">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6575">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6575">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6576">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6576">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6577">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6577">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6578">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6578">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6579">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6579">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6606">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6606">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6607">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6607">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6608">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6609">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6609">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6610">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6611">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6611">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6612">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6612">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6613">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6613">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6614">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6614">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6615">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6616">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6616">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6619">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6619">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6620">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6620">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6621">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6621">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6622">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6622">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6623">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6623">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6624">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6624">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6625">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6625">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6627">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6627">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6629">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6629">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6630">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6631">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6631">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6632">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6633">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6633">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6634">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6634">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6635">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6635">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6636">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6636">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6637">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6637">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
