## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6661">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6661">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6662">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6663">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6663">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6665">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6665">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6666">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6666">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6667">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6667">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6668">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6668">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6669">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6669">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6670">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6670">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6672">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6675">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6675">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6676">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6676">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6677">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6683">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6683">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6684">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6684">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6685">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6685">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6686">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6686">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6687">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6687">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6688">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6688">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6689">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6689">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6690">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6690">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6691">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6691">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6692">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6692">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6693">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6693">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6694">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6694">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6695">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6695">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6696">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6696">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6697">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6697">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6698">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6698">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6699">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6699">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6700">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6700">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6701">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6702">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6702">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6703">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6703">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6705">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6705">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6711">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6711">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6712">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6712">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6713">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6714">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6714">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6715">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6716">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6716">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6717">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6717">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6718">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6718">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6719">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6720">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6720">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6721">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6722">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6722">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6723">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6723">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6724">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6724">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6726">**Keywords_spain_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6726">**Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6730">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6730">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6731">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6731">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6732">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6732">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6733">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6733">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6734">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6734">driver's licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6735">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6735">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6736">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6736">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6761">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6761">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6762">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6764">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6764">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6766">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6766">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6767">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6767">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6768">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6768">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6769">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6770">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6770">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6771">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6772">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6772">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6773">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6773">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6774">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6774">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6775">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6775">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6780">dninúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6780">dninúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6781">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6781">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6783">identidadúnico #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6783">identidadúnico#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6784">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6784">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6785">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6785">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6786">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6786">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6788">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6788">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6789">nie #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6789">nie#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6790">nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6790">nie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6791">nienúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6791">nienúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6792">número de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6792">número de identificación</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6793">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6793">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6794">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6794">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6795">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6795">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6796">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6796">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6797">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6797">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6798">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6798">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6799">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6799">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6800">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6801">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6801">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6802">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6803">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6803">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6804">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6804">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6805">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6805">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6806">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6806">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6808">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6808">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6811">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6811">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6812">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6812">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6813">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6813">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6814">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6814">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6815">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6815">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6816">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6816">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6817">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6817">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6818">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6818">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6819">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6819">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6820">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6820">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6821">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6821">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6822">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6822">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6823">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6823">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6824">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6824">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6825">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6825">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6826">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6827">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6827">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6828">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6829">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6829">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6830">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6830">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6831">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6831">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6832">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6832">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6833">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6833">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6834">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6834">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6835">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6836">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6836">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6837">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6838">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6838">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6839">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6839">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6840">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6840">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6841">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6841">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6842">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6842">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6843">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6843">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6844">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6844">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6845">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6845">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6846">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6846">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6847">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6847">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6848">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6848">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6849">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6849">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6850">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6850">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6851">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6851">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6852">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6852">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6853">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6853">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6854">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6854">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6855">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6855">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6856">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6856">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6857">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6857">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6858">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6858">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6859">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6859">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6860">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6860">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6861">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6861">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6862">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6862">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6863">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6863">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6864">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6864">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6865">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6865">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6866">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6866">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6867">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6868">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6868">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6869">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6870">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6870">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6871">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6871">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6872">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6872">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6873">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6874">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6874">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6905">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6905">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6907">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6907">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6908">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6909">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6909">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6910">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6910">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6911">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6911">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6912">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6912">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6913">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6913">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6914">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6914">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6915">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6915">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6916">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6917">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6919">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6920">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6921">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6921">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6922">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6922">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6923">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6923">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6924">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6924">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6925">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6925">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6926">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6926">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6927">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6927">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6928">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6928">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6929">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6929">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6930">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6930">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6931">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6931">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6932">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6932">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6933">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6933">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6934">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6934">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6935">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6935">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6936">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6936">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6937">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6937">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6938">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6938">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6939">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6939">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6940">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6940">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6941">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6941">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6942">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6942">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6943">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6943">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6944">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6944">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6945">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6945">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6946">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6946">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6947">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6947">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6948">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6948">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6949">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6949">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6950">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6950">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6951">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6951">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6952">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6952">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6953">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6954">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6954">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6956">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6956">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6957">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6957">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6958">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6958">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6959">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6959">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6960">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6960">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6961">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6961">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6962">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6962">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6963">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6963">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6964">정규식이 해당 `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6964">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6965">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6965">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6966">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6966">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6967">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6967">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6968">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6968">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6969">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6969">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6970">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6970">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6971">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6971">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6972">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6972">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6973">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6973">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6974">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6974">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6975">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6975">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6976">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6976">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6977">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6977">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6978">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6978">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6979">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6979">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6980">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6980">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6981">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6981">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6982">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6982">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6983">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6984">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6984">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6986">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6986">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6987">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6987">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6988">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6988">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6989">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6989">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6990">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6990">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6991">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6992">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6992">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6993">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6994">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6994">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6995">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6995">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6996">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6996">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6997">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6997">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6998">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6998">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-6999">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-6999">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7000">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7000">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7002">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7002">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7004">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7004">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7005">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7006">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7008">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7008">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7009">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7009">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7010">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7010">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7011">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7011">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7012">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7012">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7013">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7013">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_sweden_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7014">Keyword_sweden_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7014">Keyword_sweden_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7015">visa requirements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7015">visa requirements</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7016">Alien Registration Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7016">Alien Registration Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7017">Schengen visas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7017">Schengen visas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7018">Schengen visa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7018">Schengen visa</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7043">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7043">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7044">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7044">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7045">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7046">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7046">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7048">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7048">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7049">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7049">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7050">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7050">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7051">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7051">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7052">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7052">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7053">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7053">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7054">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7055">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7055">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7056">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7058">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7058">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7059">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7059">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7061">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7061">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7076">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7076">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7077">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7077">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7078">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7078">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7079">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7080">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7080">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7081">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7081">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7082">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7082">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7083">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7083">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7084">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7084">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7085">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7085">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7086">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7086">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7087">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7087">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7088">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7088">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7089">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7090">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7090">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7091">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7092">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7092">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7093">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7093">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7094">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7094">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7095">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7095">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7096">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7096">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7097">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7097">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7098">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7098">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7105">세금 파일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7105">tax file</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7106">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7106">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7107">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7107">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7108">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7108">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7109">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7109">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7110">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7110">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7111">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7111">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7122">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7122">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7124">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7124">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7126">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7126">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7127">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7127">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7128">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7128">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7129">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7129">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7130">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7130">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7131">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7131">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7132">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7133">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7133">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7134">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7136">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7136">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7137">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7137">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7171">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7171">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7172">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7173">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7173">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7174">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7175">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7175">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7176">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7176">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7177">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7177">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7178">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7178">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7179">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7180">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7180">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7182">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7182">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7183">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7183">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7184">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7184">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7185">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7185">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7186">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7186">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7188">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7188">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7189">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7189">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7190">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7190">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7191">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7191">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7192">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7192">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7193">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7193">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7194">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7194">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7195">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7195">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7196">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7196">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7197">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7197">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7198">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7198">簽名</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7202">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7202">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7203">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7203">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7204">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7204">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7205">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7205">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7206">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7206">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7207">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7207">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7208">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7208">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7209">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7209">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7210">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7210">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7211">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7211">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7212">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7213">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7213">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7216">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7216">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7217">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7217">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7228">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7228">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7229">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7230">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7230">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7231">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7232">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7232">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7233">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7233">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7234">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7234">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7235">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7236">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7237">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7238">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7238">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7239">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7239">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7240">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7240">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7245">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7245">Resident Cert.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7249">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7249">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span>
