## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7254">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7254">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7255">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7256">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7256">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7258">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7258">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7259">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7259">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7260">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7260">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7265">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7265">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7266">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7266">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7267">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7268">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7268">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7274">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7274">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7277">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7277">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7279">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7279">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7280">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7281">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7281">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7282">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7283">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7283">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7285">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7286">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7286">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7287">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7287">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7288">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7289">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7289">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7290">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7290">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7291">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7291">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7295">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7295">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7296">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7296">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7297">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7297">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7298">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7298">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7299">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7300">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7300">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7301">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7302">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7302">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7303">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7303">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7304">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7304">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7305">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7305">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7306">2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7306">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7307">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7307">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7308">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7309">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7310">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7311">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7311">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7312">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7312">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7313">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7313">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7314">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7314">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7332">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7332">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7333">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7333">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7334">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7335">2개의 문자, 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7335">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7337">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7337">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7339">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7342">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7342">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7343">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7343">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7344">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7345">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7345">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7346">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7346">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7347">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7347">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7348">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7348">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7349">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7349">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7350">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7350">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7351">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7351">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7353">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7353">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7355">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7355">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7356">3 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7356">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7357">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7357">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7358">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7358">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7359">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7359">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7360">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7360">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7362">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7364">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7365">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7365">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7366">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7366">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7367">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7367">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7368">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7368">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7369">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7370">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7372">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7372">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7382">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7382">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7383">G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7383">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7384">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7384">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7385">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7385">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7386">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7386">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7387">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7387">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7388">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7388">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7389">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7389">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7390">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7390">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7391">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7392">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 자 또는 9 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7392">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7393">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7394">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7394">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7395">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7395">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7396">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7396">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7397">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7397">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7398">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7398">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7399">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7399">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7400">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7400">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7401">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7401">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7402">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7402">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7403">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7403">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7404">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7404">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7405">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7405">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7406">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7406">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7407">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7407">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7408">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7409">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7409">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7410">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7411">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7411">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7412">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7412">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7413">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7413">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7414">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7415">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7415">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7416">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7416">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7431">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7431">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7432">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7432">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7433">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7433">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7434">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7435">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7435">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7436">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7437">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7437">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7438">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7439">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7439">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7440">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7442">이 함수는 해당 `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7442">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7443">From 키워드를 `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7443">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7463">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7463">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7464">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7465">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7465">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7466">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7467">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7467">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7468">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7469">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7469">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7470">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7471">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7472">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7472">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7473">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7473">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7503">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7503">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7504">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7505">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7505">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7506">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7507">주마다 다릅니다(예: 뉴욕).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7507">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7508">Ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7508">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7509">Ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7509">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7510">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7511">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7511">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7513">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7513">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7514">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7514">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7515">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7515">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7516">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7516">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7517">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7517">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7518">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7518">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7519">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7519">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7520">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7520">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7521">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7521">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7619">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7619">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7620">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7621">"9"로 시작되고, "7" 또는 "8"을 4번째 숫자로 포함하고, 경우에 따라 공백이나 대시로 서식이 지정된 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7621">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7622">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7623">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7623">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7624">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7624">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7625">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7625">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7626">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7626">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7627">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7627">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7628">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7628">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7629">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7629">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7630">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7630">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7631">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7631">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7632">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7632">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7633">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7633">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7634">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7634">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7635">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7635">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7637">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7637">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7639">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7640">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7640">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7641">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7641">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7642">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7642">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7643">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7643">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7644">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7644">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7645">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7645">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7647">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7647">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7648">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7648">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7649">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7649">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7650">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7650">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7651">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7651">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7652">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7652">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7663">taxid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7663">taxid</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7665">Keyword_itin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7665">Keyword_itin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7666">License</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7666">License</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7670">생일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7670">Birthday</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7672">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7672">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7673">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7674">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7674">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7675">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7675">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7677">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7677">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7678">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7678">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7679">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7679">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7680">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7680">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7681">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7681">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7682">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7683">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7683">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7685">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7685">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7686">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7686">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7687">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7687">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7688">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7688">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7689">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7689">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7690">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7690">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7691">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7692">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7692">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7693">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7693">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7694">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7694">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7695">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7695">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7696">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7696">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7698">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7698">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7707">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7707">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7708">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7708">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7709">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7709">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7710">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7710">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7711">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7712">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7712">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7719">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7719">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="be6a4-7720">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be6a4-7720">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
